definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: This sounds rather contrived, but it works in practice.
sentences.chinese: 这听起来像天方夜谭，但却实际存在。

sentences.english: Sovereign default is far from inconceivable.
sentences.chinese: 主权国拖欠债务也绝非天方夜谭。

sentences.english: Moreover, it’s almost impossible to kill a vampire.
sentences.chinese: 此外，要杀死吸血鬼几乎是天方夜谭。

sentences.english: The Arabian Nights is read all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 《天方夜谭》是流传世界各地的名著。

sentences.english: Bai Mei, smile, no color of Scheherazade.
sentences.chinese: 白玫，微笑，天方夜谭的没有颜色。

sentences.english: Stealing your thoughts and dreams isn't completely farfetched.
sentences.chinese: 偷走你的想法和梦境并不完全是天方夜谭。

definition: lit. even harder than reaching the sky (idiom)/fig. extremely difficult/far from an easy task
to daydream/to indulge in wishful thinking
to imagine the wildest thing/to indulge in fantasy
unattainable/far-fetched/out of reach/exceedingly remote or distant

pinyin: ke3 wang4 er2 bu4 ke3 ji2

definition: to be the most ridiculous thing in the world (idiom)
pinyin: hua2 tian1 xia4 zhi1 da4 ji1

definition: a small appetizer/a piece of cake; very easy (idiom)
